navigation.settings.title: Settings

navigation.section.label: Navigation
settings.header.title: Preferences
settings.header.subtitle: Tweak optimisation behaviours to match the macOS app.
settings.floatingHud.pinDescription: Drag the HUD where you want it to appear and pin it in place.
settings.floatingHud.pinStatusPinned: HUD stays where you pinned it.
settings.clipboard.copyBack: Copy optimised image back to clipboard
settings.shortcuts.subtitle: Customise Clop's navigation and global shortcuts.
settings.floatingHud.hideAfter.help: Hide floating results after the specified number of seconds.
compare.subtitle: Choose images, videos, or PDFs to compare and optimise instantly.
compare.dropHint: or drop files anywhere in this window
compare.placeholder: Optimise something to see results here.
compare.dialog.title: Select files to optimise
onboarding.title: Welcome to Clop
onboarding.subtitle: Optimise images, videos, and PDFs with macOS feature parity.
onboarding.section.header: Here's how to get the most from Clop
onboarding.step.1.title: Drop files
onboarding.step.1.description: Drag photos, PDFs, or videos right into the window.
onboarding.step.2.title: Review savings
onboarding.step.2.description: Clop shows how much space you reclaimed for every item.
onboarding.step.3.title: Share instantly
onboarding.step.3.description: Copy optimised results or open their folder with a click.
onboarding.step.4.title: Automate
onboarding.step.4.description: Enable clipboard and watched folders to optimise without lifting a finger.
onboarding.callout.title: Ready to optimise your first files?
onboarding.callout.description: Drop a folder into the window or let Clop watch your clipboard automatically.
onboarding.hero.title: See Clop in action
onboarding.hero.description: A quick peek at the interface you'll use to monitor optimisations across platforms.
hud.title: Optimisations
hud.empty.title: Optimisations appear here
hud.empty.description: Run an optimisation or copy an image to the clipboard to see live status.
hud.placement.title: Pin floating HUD
hud.placement.instructions: Drag this placeholder anywhere on screen, then choose Pin to save the position.
shortcuts.capture.title: Press the keys you want to use
shortcuts.errors.conflict: That shortcut is already used by '{0}'. Pick a different combination.
shortcuts.errors.missingKey: Press a non-modifier key to create a shortcut.
shortcuts.errors.globalNeedsModifier: Global shortcuts must include at least one modifier key (Ctrl, Shift, Alt, or Win).
shortcuts.errors.modifierRequired: Add a modifier (Ctrl, Shift, Alt, or Win) for that key combination.
tray.balloon.title: Clop
settings.shortcuts.instructions: Customise shortcuts to keep Clop familiar across platforms.
settings.about.title: Made by the low-tech guys
settings.about.subtitle: Clop is maintained by the Low-tech team to keep experiences aligned across platforms.
compare.dropHint.accessible: Drop files anywhere in the window to optimise them immediately.
hud.automation.name: Optimisation results
hud.automation.help: Live list of files currently being optimised.
settings.autohide.seconds.accessible: Number of seconds before floating results are hidden.
onboarding.steps.list.help: Key actions to get productive with Clop.
